Author: not altcoin hitler
Title: Closed
Body: WEBSITE | ANN THREAD | WHITEPAPER | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | TELEGRAM | BOUNTY TELEGRAM |  Global REIT is the first ever Blockchain-Based Sharia-Compliant REIT to be launched in the market.  It will start with a Net Asset Value (NAV) of USD 75 million and will reach USD 2 billion by end of 3 years. The first ICO will take place with 90 million coins for sale. The investment made by token holders will be invested in tangible assets which will generate income for all shareholders.  A total of 2% of the total token supply will be assigned to the Bounty Pool.  The program will run until the end of the Token Sale. The bounties will be paid within 30 days after the end of the Token Sale.  General Bounty distribution:    Please check your participation in this spreadsheet  GENERAL RULE: 1. ALL bounty participants are required to join GlobalREIT’s Telegram group: https://t.me/GlobalReit 2. Subscribe to our channel for more bounty announcements: https://t.me/amazix_bounties   ANY SUBMISSION OF THEIR SHARES/POSTS ON THIS BOUNTY THREAD BEFORE AND BEYOND INCLUSIVE DATE OF EACH WEEK WILL NOT BE COUNTED  WEEK 1: 16/04/2018 - 22/04/2018   NEWSLETTER CAMPAIGN  Join our newsletter campaign and you’ll get a share from 5% bounty allocation  Application  1. Visit our website: https://globalreit.io/ 2. Scroll at the bottom part of the website and enter your E-Mail address for more updates  3. Fill and submit the following form: https://goo.gl/forms/88ip79BAmHvLBQoW2      Stakes will be paid depending on followers (at the start of the campaign).  250-749 followers:   1 stake per tweet/retweet 750-1499 followers:   2 stakes per tweet/retweet 1500-9999 followers:   4 stakes per tweet/retweet 10.000+ followers:   6 stakes per tweet/retweet  Minimum 3 tweets/retweets per week Maximum 1 tweet/retweet per hour, 4 tweets/retweets per day, and 20 retweets per week  Application: 1. Follow Global REIT on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GlobalReit01 2. Register with this form: https://goo.gl/forms/pMAWSFqaZ6oIFQj22 3. Register your retweets every week in the thread (latest within the next week) with this format:   (Replace X with week number)  ###TWITTER WEEK X### Twitter user URL: <list of tweets/retweets>  Rules: 1. Tweets/retweets must have a link to the Global REIT website https://globalreit.io/ or Telegram group AND at least 2 of these hashtags: #Crypto #Blockchain  #GlobalREIT   #BlockchainBasedREIT #ethereum #bitcoin #cryptocurrency #btc . YOU MUST INCLUDE THESE IN YOUR tweets/retweets, otherwise they won’t be counted 2. You can retweet Global REIT tweets or create your own with content from the YouTube channel, blog, etc., or anything related to Global REIT 3. Your twitter audit (https://www.twitteraudit.com/) score must be equal to at least 85% and only real followers from the last audit will count. 4. Twitter followers will NOT be updated after having registered in the campaign 5. Tweets have to be spaced at least 1 hour. Anyone breaking this rule will be banned from the bounty campaign 6. Do not retweet anything older than 4 days, it will NOT be counted 7. If no new tweets from our official twitter account, kindly make a short tweet about Global REIT and use all of our official hashtags + website link      Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers.  100-500 Followers/Friends:      1 stake per share+like 500-1500 Followers/Friends:      2 stakes per share+like 1500-3000 Followers/Friends:   4 stakes per share+like 3000 Plus Followers/Friends:      6 stakes per share+like  Minimum 3 shares per week Maximum 1 share per hour, 4 shares per day, and 20 shares per week  Application 1. Follow and like Global REIT Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/GlobalReit-144007413076936/ 2. Fill and submit this form: https://goo.gl/forms/DlP969gsK7HBXMso2 3. Register your shares every week in the forum with this format:  (Replace X with week number)  ###FACEBOOK WEEK X### <list of shares>   Rules: 1. Participants must share and like Global REIT posts 2. Shares must have a link to the Global REIT website https://globalreit.io/ or Telegram group https://t.me/GlobalReit AND at least 2 of these hashtags: #Crypto #Blockchain  #GlobalREIT   #BlockchainBasedREIT #ethereum #bitcoin #cryptocurrency #btc. YOU MUST INCLUDE THESE IN YOUR posts/shares, otherwise they won’t be counted 3. Shares have to be spaced at least 1 hour. Anyone breaking this rule will be banned from the bounty campaign 4. Accounts with fake friends/followers will be disqualified 5. Friends/followers will NOT be updated after having registered in the campaign 6. All shared articles must also be liked 7. Do not share anything older than 4 days, it will not be counted 8. Please DO NOT post rubbish comments, it is neither necessary nor wanted 9.  If no new posts from our official Facebook account, kindly make a short post about Global REIT and use all of our official hashtags + website link     This bounty consists of two tasks:  1. Translation of ANN+bounty thread 2. Creation and moderation of local Telegram/Wechat/Kakaochat groups  Stakes earned will depend on the activity in the thread and the number of members in the Telegram/Wechat/Kakaochat group.  Translation of pinned message from main group: 10 stakes + 2 stake/member at the end of campaign ANN+bounty threads: 50 stakes + 10 Stakes per valid post  Application:  1. Send an email to bounty@amazix.com with the following details: Native language Part of bounty you apply for (ANN/Telegram) Translation/moderation experience (if any) Bitcointalk username ERC-20 wallet address 2. After being accepted and completing the translation, Post in this thread with a link to the translated thread or whitepaper  Rules: 1. Participants are required to keep the local thread and Telegram groups alive by posting and translating regular updates, news or any important announcements. A single post thread will be rejected. 2. Automatic (Google or similar) translations or translations with low quality will be rejected. 3. Unnecessary or repeated posts shall be rejected for stake counting 4. Only posts written by the OP will count     Distribution of stakes according to user level:  Jr. Member:    1 stake/week Member:      2 stakes/week Full Member:   3 stakes/week Sr Member:      5 stakes/week Hero/Legendary:   7 stakes/week  Application: 1. Add signature of your level, avatar and personal text 2. Fill and submit this form: https://goo.gl/forms/yabk7bxnpRsmor1V2  Rules: 1. Signature, avatar and personal text must be kept until the stakes have been calculated after the end of the TGE (allow around a week for these calculations) 2. A minimum of 15 meaningful posts per week must be made during this period. Off-topic, spam and meaningless posts will not count. 3. Posts must have a minimum length of 70 characters 4. Posts on local boards are allowed but no more than 30% of the total amount 5. Personal text: “BLOCKCHAIN BASED REIT ”     Spread the word with your original content and earn tokens by: Blogging about Global REIT, promoting it in other forums, in your Facebook/LinkedIn group or any other social outlet with a large outreach creating YouTube videos (including interviews)  30% of the allocation (0.09% of all sold tokens) will be reserved for invite-only VIP content creators.  Stakes earned depending on quality (decided by AmaZix/Global REIT after review):  Rejected: 0 stakes Low: 1 stake Medium: 2 stakes High: 3 stakes (per post/video)  Reposting on another (relevant) site will earn an extra 50% of stakes (one repost per article allowed)     Application: 1. Complete and submit the following form (once your videos are uploaded or your articles are posted): https://goo.gl/forms/oF3h0FrKuRNoETun2 2. Post a link to your article/video here  Rules:  1. Videos and articles have to be meaningful and related to Bitnation: the Token Sale, aspects of the Whitepaper, etc. (whether or not it’s relevant remains at the sole discretion of Amazix/Global REIT). 2. Blog posts must have at least 250 words and forum posts must have at least 100 words. 3. Blogs/forums/videos in languages other than English may also be accepted (at the sole discretion of Amazix/Global REIT). Please contact me first to check. When asking for approval, provide these details or else application will not be entertained Name of ICO you’re applying for the article content campaign : Previous articles/videos you made. NOTE: ANY NON-PREAPPROVED ARTICLE/VIDEO CREATED IN A FOREIGN LANGUAGE WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY REJECTED (0 STAKES AWARDED) 4. All articles must contain links to Bitnation website, the Telegram group and the ANN/Bounty threads 5. Videos/articles with fake views will be disqualified 6. Only original content will be accepted 7. Spamming/posting in wrong subforums will not be tolerated. Posts deleted or closed by the forum’s administration will not count.   CryptoCompare  ON HOLD  Follow Global REIT on CryptoCompare and earn some tokens  1 stake per follower  Application  1. Open an account on Cryptocompare and follow GlobalREIT: XXX 2. Submit this form: #     Spread the word in your Telegram group about Global REIT and earn some tokens  100-249 Members: 1 stake/post 250-749 Members: 2 stakes/post 750-2499 Members: 4 stakes/post 2500+: 6 stakes/post  Extra stakes: Pin pitch post during the whole week and receive x10 stakes per week. You are not eligible to receive more stakes by posting pitch on daily basis if it pinned.   Application 1. Contact @Awallon_X via Telegram to check if your group/channel are eligible to join. 2. Once approved you will receive a pitch to post in the group/channel. 3. Post pitch during the exact week (dates clarified in bounty thread or in the spreadsheet “Telegram Owners - Approved”). 4. Upload the screenshot (using imgur, postimage or similar) and report it in this bounty thread. 5. Make report in last day of exact week (dates clarified in bounty thread or in the spreadsheet).  ####TELEGRAM WEEK X#### Link to Telegram post  Rules 1. A maximum of 1 post per day is allowed in each group 2. Channels are allowed to post 3 times per week, but will get double stakes. No more than 3 posts will be accepted during the week. (This rules is required, because audience won’t accept daily spam in good channel what is bad for advertising value) 3. Groups with fake members will be disqualified.   Bonus  5% of tokens are reserved for bounty participants who go the extra mile and make a special effort to promote our Token Sale. These tokens will be assigned at the sole discretion of AmaZix/Global REIT (so we won’t accept any objections to how they are distributed).  Some activities that could be worthy of these tokens are: Content with an especially high quality or outreach Opening new channels for the promotion of the sale Above average activity in Telegram groups or ANN threads  If you feel like you have an idea for promotion that doesn’t fall into any category but would bring a high value, don’t hesitate to drop us a line!   General rules:  1. The Bounty Manager and the Team reserve their right to make changes to the terms in any moment (except the allocation). 2. Payment addresses will NOT be changed after submission. 3. Any kind of offensive or inadequate behaviour when promoting GlobalREIT will result in immediate disqualification from the bounty campaign 4. Bounty Managers/Team decisions are final.
